author: Alemas
title: Actually, I think THIS was my first LEGO set!
review:
I remembered that I had this too, but I didn't expect this to be released a year before I was born! This set has a, well, tractor, a plough, and an attachment with a red cylinder with yellow stripes that can spin with dragged along the ground. It also has a farmer minifig and a piglet!

Pros
Tractor
Accessories
Piglet
Minifig

Cons
None!

Overall, a good set for the little kids!
